title.narrative: 2015-2016 HEALTH SYSTEMS AND SERVICES

description.narrative: 4.1. Strengthened systems and capacities for equitable provision of quality health services including ECD/ECI services, nutrition and immunization, especially for the most vulnerable and excluded children, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Health Systems Strengthening, Immunization, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, an increased number of young boys and girls, including hard-to-reach children, Roma children and children with disabilities have access to quality health services including IECD

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 4.1. Strengthened systems and capacities for equitable provision of quality health services including ECD/ECI services, nutritionand immunization, especially for the most vulnerable and excluded children

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened systems and capacities in health and nutrition through policy development and capacity building in ECD and ECI, a country wide assessment of immunization status, accreditation of 15 maternity wards as Xbaby-friendly,&39; and expansion of nutrition-friendly kindergartens from 12 to 16. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:05/10/2016

title.narrative: Inter sectoral IECD action plan with budgets developed in at least 5 cantons in FBiH(35695)

actual.value: 2016:Overachieved: RS Government established Intersectoral ECD Entity working group comprised of MOHSW, MOE and MOFYSIntersectoral ECD protocol for RS developed;2 IECD Cantonal action plans developed and endorsed

title.narrative: Process of baby friendly recertification of all hospitals in BiH completed in cooperation with the relevant government institutions (37819)

actual.value: 2016:14 maternity wards from FBIH plus 1 maternity ward from Brcko District received BFH accreditation

title.narrative: Number of health professionals who gathered knowledge on latest developments in the field of immunisation.(62661)
Existence of a Multi-Year Plan (MYP) for immunisation

actual.value: 2016:Both entity Ministries of Health are currently updating Multi Year Immunization Plans (MYIP), which were initiated after UNICEF advocacy on the need to increase immunization coverage.

title.narrative: Existence of a Multi-Year Plan (MYP) for immunisation

title.narrative: Multi-year immunization plan developed(yes/no)(35690)

actual.value: 2016:The MYIP not developed, but process of development has been initiated with entity MOHs and MOCA. Planning meetings organized at the state and entity levels. WHO is mobilized to be engaged in the initiative.

title.narrative: Multi-year immunization plan developed(yes/no)(35690)

actual.value: 2016:The MYIP not developed, but process of development has been initiated with entity MOHs and MOCA. Planning meetings organized at the state and entity levels. WHO is mobilized to be engaged in the initiative.
